dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2639921K] Copyright violation of dinehere.ca at dingingblogs.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 18, 2007 9:32 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2639921K] Copyright violation of dinehere.ca at
dingingblogs.com

From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2639921K] Copyright violation of dinehere.ca at
dingingblogs.com
Reference: [ThePlanet-C2639921K]

For your review. 

--
Regards,
Abuse Department
The Planet
abuse@theplanet.com
http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html


==== Original Message ====

From: Chad DeGroot <chad@dinehere.ca>
Subject: Copyright violation of dinehere.ca at dingingblogs.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com, abuse@ev1servers.net
Cc: 'Roger Williams' <roger@dinehere.ca>, Mike@dinehere.ca
Message-id: <000601c73b44$ca7fb350$1400a8c0@elp>
MIME-version: 1.0
X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028

Content-type: text/plain; charset=US-ASCII

Importance: High
X-Priority: 1 (Highest)
X-MSMail-priority: High
Thread-index: Acc7RMo4iGqwLgTNRjq1ZcpVVJ7pPg==
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 18 Jan 2007 21:08:45.0033 (UTC)
FILETIME=[D6C3F590:01C73B44] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, 
 
We have recently discovered a web site hosted on your network called
diningblogs.com [64.246.34.78]. An Arin whois lookup revealed that the
IP address is registered to EV1 Servers, now The Planet. I have sent
this email to both abuse@ev1servers.net and abuse@theplanet.com in order
to hopefully resolve this matter quickly. 
 
Dine Here (www.dinehere.ca) is a web site originally created in Nov 2004
which is dedicated to restaurant reviews for Greater Vancouver, Victoria
and Whistler BC. We are an authority dining site, probably the most
popular in BC, Canada. Interestingly enough, we are also hosted at EV1
on a dedicated server we recently procured from your company. 
 
Diningblogs.com [www.diningblogs.com] have blatantly stolen the
restaurant information (and design) from dinehere.ca, a quick inspection
of both web sites will confirm this fact.  
 
The domain diningblogs.com was registered on November 27th, 2006, over 2
years after dinehere.ca was registered and operating. A review of the
Internet Archive for Dine Here
[http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.dinehere.ca] clearly shows that
we have been operating with precendance of the content that is in
dispute. 
 
The domain diningblogs.com's registration information is being hidden
using a 3rd party privacy service which further complicates matters. We
have attempted to contact the webmasters of diningblogs.com using their
contact form on their web site and have not received any response. 
 
We consider the restaurant names, address, phone #s, restaurant cuisine
classifications, and location classifications all copyrighted
information that is property of Dine Here. Our intellectual property has
been stolen to create their web site. 
 
This is a clear breach of acceptable terms of use posted on your web
site. 
We require immediate action which should include termination of their
service and deactivation of this web site to resolve this matter. 
 
Please respond as soon as you can, we consider this matter urgent. 
 
Regards,
~Chad 
 
--
Chad DeGroot
604-739-1048
